conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
ship_1 contains tables such as ship.
Table ship has columns such as ship_id, name, type, built_year, class, flag.
conversations.query: Return the flag that is most common among all ships.
conversations.answer: select flag from ship group by flag order by count(*) desc limit 1;
